companyName: Law Offices of Michael Oran, APC - Los Angeles, CA

moreBlocks.lawyersAtLawOfficesOfMichaelOran,APCSele: • Oran, Michael On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
Here at the Law Offices of Michael Oran, APC, in Los Angeles, California, we provide exceptional advocacy and support to clients throughout Southern California who suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one due to the negligent, careless and wrongful actions of health care providers and other health-related professionals.

A top-ranked trial lawyer with more than 37 years of legal experience, attorney Michael Oran established our law firm with a mission to deliver the highest level of representation possible to individuals and families in need. This means you can rely on us to fight aggressively to significantly increase your odds of achieving the favorable outcomes you seek and the justice you deserve.

Over the course of our history, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, earning our membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum. We have also received numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients, and our law firm has become one of our area's premier practices for those adversely affected by any of the following:

  • Birth injuries
  • Catastrophic personal injuries
  • Wrongful death
  • Medical malpractice
  • Kaiser/HMO malpractice
  • Elder or dependent abuse
  • Failure to diagnose
  • Other preventable health care-related tragedies

Mr. Oran is an active member of the American Board of Trial Advocates. He has also received perennial designation as among the top lawyers in our region each year since 2004. This means you can expect to receive unmatched representation for your legal matter, and we will accept no fee unless we win your case.

To discuss your legal matter with no risk and no obligation, you can contact the Law Offices of Michael Oran, APC, to take advantage of our law firm's free initial consultation. We also currently offer virtual consultations to ensure your health and safety during these uncertain times.
